translation.en: Everything happens for a reason.
translation.ja: 全ては理由があって起きる

translation.en: Think about that for a moment.
All your efforts...
personal, professional, carnal...
translation.ja: 職場や家庭肉体で起きることには…

translation.en: utter and absolute slaves...
to some cosmically
predetermined set of outcomes.
As if we have no say in, let alone culpability for,
translation.ja: 決定権がないから人生を変える瞬間に対しても

translation.en: the defining moments in our lives.
If you want a life of purpose...
translation.ja: 全ては理由があって起きる

translation.en: by inverting the notion...
that everything happens for a reason.
translation.ja: 目的ある人生を求むなら

translation.en: Redefine it.
Not as some future explanation
translation.ja: まだ起きてもない― 恐ろしい悲劇や輝かしい成功と

translation.en: for terrible tragedy,
translation.ja: 恐ろしい悲劇や輝かしい成功と

translation.en: or glorious achievement,
translation.ja: 結びつけるのではなく

translation.en: but as validation...
of the deliberate choices that lead us to these critical junctures in the first place.
translation.ja: 導くのは 自分自身の意図的な選択だと

translation.en: Assert authority over chance, fate,
translation.ja: 偶然や運命宿命などではなく意思だと

translation.en: and destiny, because everything does happen for a reason.
translation.ja: なぜなら 全ては理由があって起きるから

translation.en: And that reason is you.
To attain elite success,
translation.ja: 仕事で成功したければ

translation.en: you must be willing to make the hard choices,
translation.ja: 進んで難しい選択をしなければならない

translation.en: do the unpleasant things,
risk your most valuable assets,
translation.ja: 大切な資産を危険にさらし

translation.en: and do away with the shackles designed by society to limit us:
translation.ja: 愛や結婚 子供など 私達を縛る社会が作った足かせ―

translation.en: love, marriage, children.
translation.ja: 私達を縛る社会が作った足かせ―

translation.en: And above all,
the uninvited imposition
translation.ja: つまらぬ人々が押し付けてくる―

translation.en: of lesser people's moral agendas.
translation.ja: モラルも無視しなければならない

translation.en: Because nothing worthwhile
translation.ja: なぜなら 犠牲なしには偉業を成し遂げることなど―

translation.en: is ever achieved without sacrifice.
translation.ja: 犠牲なしには偉業を成し遂げることなど― できないからだ

translation.en: And true greatness...
only comes to those...
translation.ja: あらゆる代償を払って…

translation.en: willing to pursue it...
translation.ja: 求めることによってのみ…

translation.en: at...
any cost.
[man on laptop] Ladies, gentlemen, Mr. and Mrs. Sean Donovan!
translation.ja: 皆さんドノバン夫妻の誕生です

translation.en: Ah, let's see it. Come on, kiss her!
-[applause] -Yeah!
[man] Yeah!
[guard] Hold on there, miss!
May I help you?
Oh, hello again, Mrs. Donovan.
translation.ja: ああ ドノバンさん

translation.en: Hi.
Sorry.
I have some legal paperwork for Miss Montgomery.
translation.ja: 書類にモンゴメリーさんの署名が必要で

translation.en: I'm just gonna run up for a quick signature.
translation.ja: ちょっとだけお邪魔しようと

translation.en: Uh, I still need to call you up.
translation.ja: それでも連絡しないと

translation.en: It's really coming down out there, huh?
[guard] Hey! Hey!
Hey! Wait! Wait!
Hey! Hey! Hey!
This is Lisa Donovan, and I need to speak with my husband right now.
translation.ja: リサです 夫と今すぐ話させてください

translation.en: Hello? Can anybody hear me?
-[elevator bell dings] -Fuck.
Sean!
Sean!
Sean?
Sean!
Call it off!
[woman on radio] Forecast for the Bay Area today will be cool and breezy
translation.ja: ３日前 湾岸地区は冷たい風が強く…

translation.en: [man chuckles] All right, all right.
Castro, I get it. I get it. I get it.
translation.ja: カストロ起きるってば

translation.en: We'll go on a walk.
Just let me get my pants on, and we'll get out there in two minutes.
translation.ja: パンツだけ履いたらすぐ出発だ

translation.en: All right. I see you. I see you.
We're going outside right now. Give me a second.
Hey, hey, hey.
Will you be here when we get back for a proper good morning?
translation.ja: 帰ってきた時まだいる？

translation.en: I wish.
I have to stop by the lab before my first pitch.
translation.ja: プレゼンの前にラボへ行って

translation.en: I needed to make sure that my presentation transferred.
translation.ja: 資料が転送済みか確認しないと

translation.en: I know the feeling.
First pitch is always the scariest. Just gotta stay in the moment.
translation.ja: 初のプレゼンは緊張するよな

translation.en: Try not to think of all the things you can't control, focus on what you can.
translation.ja: できることにだけ集中して他は忘れろ

translation.en: What if I freeze?
First Triple-A game I played... Giants sent their scouts down.
translation.ja: ジャイアンツのスカウトが俺の試合を見に来た時

translation.en: On my first windup, my cleat broke off my shoe
translation.ja: 初球で靴のスパイクが折れ球が…

translation.en: and the ball sailed about five feet over the catcher.
translation.ja: 初球で靴のスパイクが折れ球が… 前方に転がった

translation.en: I knew if I didn't pull it together right then, I'd never get another shot.
translation.ja: そこで踏ん張らなければ２度とチャンスはない

translation.en: So...
I picked up the cleat,
translation.ja: スパイクを拾いポケットに入れた

translation.en: and put in my pocket as a symbol of all the obstacles,
translation.ja: スパイクを拾いポケットに入れた 現実と想像から来る障害の…

translation.en: real and imagined, bouncing around inside my head.
translation.ja: 現実と想像から来る障害の… 象徴としてね

translation.en: Figured if I could condense all that noise into something smaller to fit in a pocket...
translation.ja: 障害をポケットサイズに凝縮できるなら…

translation.en: then all my self-doubt could be managed.
Threw my first no-hitter that day.
translation.ja: その日 無安打を達成した

translation.en: You're gonna crush it.
Thank you.
-Come on, Castro. -[Castro barks]
Good morning.
translation.ja: おはようございますリサ･ドノバンです

translation.en: My name is Lisa Ruiz-Donovan,
translation.ja: おはようございますリサ･ドノバンです 医療研究を行う我が社は出資パートナーを―

translation.en: and I am seeking an equity partner for my medical solutions company,
translation.ja: 医療研究を行う我が社は出資パートナーを―

translation.en: Emigen Molecular Sequencing.
Emigen Molecular Sequencing. Emigen Molecular Sequencing.
translation.ja: エミジェン･シークエンシング社です

translation.en: -Hmm. -Good job, young lady.
Thanks for coming in.
This isn't an area we're interested in exploring.
Let us talk and get back to you.
Okay?
Everybody's hard at work, I see.
Anymore billion-dollar breakthroughs?
-Just the one. -Minus the billion.
Any calls, Sophie?
Landlord.
-Want me to get him? -I'll call from my desk.
-Did you eat? -Yep.
Both feet.
Scratched three VCs off the list.
translation.ja: 投資会社はダメだった

translation.en: Before I make this call, please tell me there's enough in our account to cover rent.
translation.ja: 家賃払うお金まだある？

translation.en: Yeah, for two months.
But payroll is another story.
I know you don't want to hear this, but I think it's time we consider approaching the drug companies.
translation.ja: この際 製薬会社にアプローチしたら？

translation.en: No way. They would just buy us to kill us.
True, but at least you would get your money back.
You haven't taken a salary since we started this thing.
translation.ja: ずっと 無給でしょ？

translation.en: And you could be making five times what I'm paying you anyplace else.
translation.ja: あなたも よそで５倍の給与が取れる

translation.en: -Ten. -See?
You're in for the cause, same as I am.
translation.ja: あなたも私と同じ大義がある

translation.en: I would deny that in court, bankruptcy or otherwise.
translation.ja: 倒産するならそれは否定する

translation.en: Fine, I will continue to help you on your hunt for the golden ticket.
translation.ja: あなたに付き合ってあげるから

translation.en: As long as you promise to rework your pitch.
translation.ja: プレゼンを書き直して

translation.en: What's wrong with my pitch? We fact-checked it a hundred times.
translation.ja: プレゼンに何の問題が？

translation.en: Facts are not your problem.
It's emotional engagement.
I know this is outside of your comfort zone.
translation.ja: 気が進まないだろうけど

translation.en: But you already have your way in.
You just have to use it.
[woman] Catch us up, guys.
Trevor McIntire, seven years old, pulled a frying pan of hot grease onto his head.
translation.ja: ７歳の少年　油を頭に浴びてる

translation.en: -Guardian? -Welfare mom. Still trying to locate her.
translation.ja: 親は？ 無職の母親が

translation.en: Looks like old scarring under the new injury.
Let's get him up to Burn One for a head-to-toe.
You've got a nice strong arm there, Trev.
You like baseball?
I'm gonna go up with him.
Hang in there, little man. All right?
Giants sure could use a guy like you in the bullpen.
translation.ja: 将来はジャイアンツの投手だ

translation.en: [Sean] Hey, Todd.
-I'll catch you back at the van. -Yeah.
Ooh, hey, Doc, can I get some attention over here?
translation.ja: 先生 こうすると手が痛い

translation.en: It hurts when I do this.
Oh. [chuckles] Maybe you should stop doing that.
I don't know, I can't seem to help myself.
translation.ja: やめたいが― 誰かの側に来ると止まらない

translation.en: It's automatic when I get around a certain someone.
translation.ja: 誰かの側に来ると止まらない

translation.en: Todd, please. Can't you see this isn't the time or the place?
translation.ja: トッド　今はダメよ

translation.en: Hmm. Well, what I could see is you looking a little tense,
translation.ja: ピリピリしてるようだから

translation.en: so I thought I'd try to put a smile on your face.
translation.ja: 笑顔にするために来たんだ

translation.en: [Todd] What's wrong?
We just lost a patient on the table.
translation.ja: 患者が手術中に亡くなったの

translation.en: Oh, babe, I'm sorry.
On top of that, we're short-staffed again.
And since I'm the low resident on the totem pole, I'm forced to pick up the slack.
translation.ja: 新米研修医の私にしわ寄せが来てる

translation.en: Well, as long as I've known you, no one's ever forced you to do something you don't wanna do, Ange.
translation.ja: 誰も君に無理強いできない

translation.en: You can always say no.
You're right.
I need to have that conversation.
My girl. See you at home.
Okay. Bye.
You sure I can go?
-Stop. -You sure I'm good?
[man] Name your crime, Todd.
I don't know.
I'd kill Hitler. I'd for sure kill Hitler.
That's not a confession, that's more a moral imperative.
translation.ja: それはゲームの趣旨じゃない

translation.en: Angela, show your man how it's done.
Yeah, no, there are too many guy questions in this bowl.
translation.ja: 男性向けの質問が多すぎる

translation.en: I'm so sorry, everyone.
This party is no longer accepting apologies, only confessions.
translation.ja: 受け入れるのは懺悔だけ

translation.en: -You're up. -Oh.
I thought maybe you'd retire this game along with my brother's 20s.
translation.ja: このゲームは学生の頃に止めたのでは？

translation.en: Forever young, baby, forever young.
translation.ja: 心はずっと若いままだ

translation.en: Uh... "Would you ever have sex with someone while you're in a relationship with someone else?"
translation.ja: “恋人がいても他の人とセックスする？”

translation.en: -Oh. -I'm guessing this is yours, Lionel.
translation.ja: “恋人がいても他の人とセックスする？” あなたの質問ね

translation.en: All the good ones are.
Hold on. We talking, like, swinging, hall pass, or whatever's trendy with the gay boys these days?
translation.ja: フリーセックスや流行りのゲイプレイも含む？

translation.en: Ooh! I'm talking complete and total transparency.
Sex can be in the same room with multiple people.
translation.ja: 同室での乱交プレイも含むぞ

translation.en: Sorry to disappoint, but I already got all the man I can handle.
translation.ja: 悪いけど　一人で精一杯よ

translation.en: [kiss] He's enough for me.
What? Look, look.
If it's all above board then I'm definitely, definitely
translation.ja: 正直に言うぞ 俺なら

translation.en: order me up a hot meat sandwich with two slices of J-Lo and my sweet lady Angela.
translation.ja: Ｊ(ジェニファー)･ロペスとアンジェラの３人で熱い夜をすごす

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh, baby, nobody asked you.
translation.ja: 誰も訊いてないでしょ

translation.en: Um, will you excuse me while I try to wipe that out of my brain?
translation.ja: 頭をすっきりさせてくるわ

translation.en: Okay, so you're saying if you could have a no harm, no foul,
translation.ja: バックストリート･ボーイズの―

translation.en: one-off with one of your favorite Backstreet Boys, you'd say no?
translation.ja: １人が誘って咎められなくても断る？

translation.en: Backstreet Boys...
translation.ja: 〝リサ〞 バックストリート･ボーイズ…

translation.en: I might have mentioned your bedroom ceiling was covered in Backstreet posters growing up.
translation.ja: 学生時代にファンだったと口を滑らしたかも

translation.en: So was yours.
Amen, sister.
-Hey, cake's in the fridge. -Okay.
All right. Well, who's next?
No.
Yeah, well, that makes two of us, I guess.
-Oh, sorry. -No.
It's fine.
It's nothing.
-Would you mind handing me that lighter? -Yes.
Who is that?
It's the chief of surgery.
Is there a problem at the hospital?
[Sean] What's the holdup in here?
Marcos will only be 30 for a year.
Why don't you pass out the plates and forks and we'll be out in just a sec?
translation.ja: お皿とフォークを配ってすぐ行くから

translation.en: Yeah, sure thing.
I didn't mean for any of this to happen.
translation.ja: そんなつもりはなかったのに…

translation.en: It just happened.
What does that mean for you and Todd?
I don't know.
I keep telling myself I'm gonna end it, but...
translation.ja: ダメだとわかってるけど

translation.en: Look, promise me you won't say anything.
translation.ja: 誰にも言わないで特にショーンには

translation.en: It will kill Todd to hear this secondhand, especially coming from Sean.
translation.ja: 誰にも言わないで特にショーンには 彼がひどく傷つくわ

translation.en: Angela...
I'm not asking you to lie.
I just need time to figure everything out.
translation.ja: 考える時間が必要なの

translation.en: Promise me, Lisa.
[woman] How are you feeling about the pitch?
Way less comfortable than I was with the fact-y figure-y version.
translation.ja: 事実を述べている方がずっと簡単よ

translation.en: But objectively, I know you pointed me in the right direction.
translation.ja: でも あなたの言う通りだわ

translation.en: Good, 'cause Gage Scott Ventures wants to meet with you tomorrow at 4:00.
translation.ja: ＧＳＶ社と明日４時にアポを入れたわ

translation.en: Wait, what? I thought they weren't interested.
translation.ja: あの会社には断られたわ

translation.en: That was before Mr. Scott found out there was a competitive bid from his old firm.
translation.ja: それは他社も我が社を狙ってると知る前よ

translation.en: So we're peddling fake news now?
I didn't make the rules, I'm just playing the game.
translation.ja: ルールに従ってゲームしてるの

translation.en: I thought a little FOMO would go a long way with a guy like that.
translation.ja: あの種の男にはこれしかない

translation.en: As it turns out, I was right.
You're an evil genius.
I know. By the way, I am sending you the link.
translation.ja: 知ってるところでリンクを送ったわ

translation.en: This guy's got some seriously stereotypical taste in women.
translation.ja: この男は女好きよ スーツ以外の服で行って

translation.en: You might want to consider wearing something
translation.ja: スーツ以外の服で行って

translation.en: a little less business-y and a little more--
-Demeaning? -Don't be naive. We can't afford it.
translation.ja: 屈辱的？ そう言わないで

translation.en: [Sean] Dog's walked, garbage curbed, dishes done...
translation.ja: 犬の散歩　ゴミ出し― 皿洗い完了

translation.en: Okay to come to bed or you need to keep going?
Why couldn't Sean have a twin who's into a work-obsessed Fortnite enthusiast,
translation.ja: 仕事とゲームにハマってる女が―

translation.en: pushing the dark side of her 20s?
You'd only break his heart, Cassidy.
Not before breaking his balls.
Don't keep her up too late, Romeo.
She's got a misogynist dragon to slay.
translation.ja: 重要なプレゼンが控えてる

translation.en: Oh... my God.
How did you even get that on?
You ready to bring some sexy back?
That's the wrong...
boy band and singer. [laughs]
Come here.
You and Angela settle whatever was going on in the kitchen earlier?
translation.ja: アンジェラとの話は解決したの？

translation.en: Yeah. She's just working through an issue with a co-worker
translation.ja: ええ　同僚と問題を抱えてて―

translation.en: and needed to get some of it off her chest.
translation.ja: 吐き出したかったみたい

translation.en: Well, she's been married to Todd since high school.
If Angela can make that work, whatever this is should be no problem.
translation.ja: 夫婦関係以外は大した問題にならない

translation.en: What else?
You worried about the company?
I just don't wanna let everyone down.
translation.ja: 皆を失望させたくない

translation.en: Least of all, you.
Nothing you do could ever let me down.
translation.ja: 君に失望なんてしない

translation.en: It's all gonna be okay.
How do you know?
Because we've got each other.
[Lisa] This little munchkin with the devilish grin
translation.ja: このいたずら笑顔の子は…

translation.en: is my sister, Emilia.
That's my brother Marcos,
and the little girl with the unfortunate pair of trifocals is yours truly.
translation.ja: ブサイクな眼鏡をしてるのが私

translation.en: Our mother used to say, whatever mischief one of us didn't conjure up,
translation.ja: “いつも誰かが悪だくみをしていた”

translation.en: the other two would.
And she was right. We were...
inseparable growing up.
translation.ja: 私達はいつも一緒でした

translation.en: But obviously, it's not your real family we're talking about here, right?
translation.ja: でも君の本当の家族じゃないんだろ？

translation.en: My birth parents were killed in a house fire when I was three.
translation.ja: 実の両親は私が３歳の時火事で他界し

translation.en: My nanny ended up adopting me so I wouldn't become a ward of the state, so...
translation.ja: 不憫(ふびん)に思った子守が私を引き取ったので―

translation.en: yeah, this is my real family.
Here's Emilia again with her hospital suitemate Tiffany.
translation.ja: これはエミリアと同室のティファニー

translation.en: Both were diagnosed with acute lymphocytic leukemia at age eight.
translation.ja: ２人は８歳の時急性リンパ性白血病と診断

translation.en: This is six months into treatment.
As you can see, Tiffany is thriving...
translation.ja: ティファニーは回復し

translation.en: while Emilia...
is struggling.
Acute lymphocytic leukemia, is a curable disease.
translation.ja: 急性リンパ性白血病は治る病気です

translation.en: The drug protocol designed to fight it produces a 90 percent survival rate.
translation.ja: 治療薬の治験データでは生存率が９割以上です

translation.en: Unfortunately, because of a genetic deviation
translation.ja: ですが 遺伝子の違いにより一部の子供には―

translation.en: in some children's immune cell checkpoints,
translation.ja: 遺伝子の違いにより一部の子供には―

translation.en: the treatment is rendered ineffectual for them.
translation.ja: この治療法が効きません

translation.en: [Lisa] My little sister lost her battle six days before her ninth birthday.
translation.ja: ９歳の誕生日を向かえる６日前に妹は亡くなりました

translation.en: If it were me who had gotten sick instead of her,
translation.ja: 病気になったのが私だったら

translation.en: we'd likely both be alive, and...
translation.ja: ２人共 今頃生きていたし

translation.en: I might not have devoted my life to this cause.
translation.ja: 私もこの事業に人生をかけなかった

translation.en: What we're working towards at Emigen,
translation.ja: 我が社では各個人の免疫系に合わせ

translation.en: is a customized map of the blockers and receptors
translation.ja: 我が社では各個人の免疫系に合わせ 阻害剤とレセプタをマッピングすることで

translation.en: in every human being's unique immune system
translation.ja: 阻害剤とレセプタをマッピングすることで

translation.en: so that drug companies can optimize medications to work on all patients battling a life-threatening disease...
translation.ja: 全ての人に有効な重大疾患の特効薬を作れます

translation.en: not just the lucky ones.
It's, um...
It's a very impressive presentation.
translation.ja: 胸を打つプレゼンだった

translation.en: I can honestly say with...
every fiber of what some tell me is a very jaded heart...
translation.ja: 心無いプレゼンに飽き飽きしていてね

translation.en: that nothing would make me happier than to invest in your company.
translation.ja: 君の会社に投資したいと思ったよ

translation.en: [man] But I see a flaw in your proposal that just can't be overlooked.
translation.ja: しかし君の提案には見過ごせない問題がある

translation.en: I'm afraid big pharma would drown us in litigation
translation.ja: 成果を出す前に 大手製薬会社に起訴され潰されるだろう

translation.en: before we even got in the game.
translation.ja: 大手製薬会社に起訴され潰されるだろう

translation.en: Hey, I'm sorry about your sister.
I, uh, I wish there was more I could do.
Yeah, I get that a lot.
translation.ja: ええよく聞く台詞です

translation.en: Ma'am.
Oh, thank you.
Hey, bartender, how about something cheap and wet?
translation.ja: バーテンダーさん 潤してくれる？

translation.en: You asking or offering?
What's it look like?
Looks like you could use a bubble bath and some black coffee.
translation.ja: 泡風呂とコーヒーが必要だな

translation.en: As it happens...
that's our special tonight.
What's this?
I got us a room overlooking the Bay Bridge.
translation.ja: 夜景がきれいな部屋を取ってある

translation.en: We're celebrating.
How is it possible that you're not... [laughs]
...reading this picture?
No investor will touch me,
my staff is about to be unemployed.
[fighting back tears] Both your life savings and the loan my parents gave me
translation.ja: ずっと貯めた貯金も親に借りたお金も

translation.en: has evaporated.
And we can't... [sobs]
translation.ja: 夜景の素敵な部屋なんて

translation.en: We can't afford a room overlooking the Bay Bridge.
Hey.
Hey.
You can't solve all the world's problems. You knew that going into this.
translation.ja: うまくいかない時もあるこれは想定内だろ

translation.en: That's one.
Two, the hotel room is free,
courtesy of one very cool night manager.
translation.ja: マネージャーの粋なはからいさ

translation.en: Three, if your company does go under, your employees knew the risks
translation.ja: さらに社員もリスクを知ってた

translation.en: and they're all smart enough to land on their feet.
translation.ja: 新しい職を見つけるさ

translation.en: We're gonna pay back every cent your parents lent us.
translation.ja: お金はちゃんと返すさ

translation.en: I'll... rob a bank if I have to.
translation.ja: 君のためなら銀行強盗だってする

translation.en: You would, wouldn't you?
Room 4703.
Give me half an hour to shut the bar down. No one's coming out in this rain anyway.
translation.ja: 店を閉めるよこの雨じゃ 客は来ない

translation.en: -Mm? -I'm sorry.
I love you.
Get out of here.
[sighs] Last call!
[woman] I'll have a gin martini.
translation.ja: マティーニをいただくわ

translation.en: One olive, very dry.
Sorry. Didn't see you there.
translation.ja: 気づかなくてすみません

translation.en: What kind of gin do you prefer?
Which do you prefer?
[chuckles] I drink whiskey.
I'd have brought it over to you.
Mm. I don't like to drink alone.
Pour yourself a whiskey.
[chuckles] Can't. Company rules.
Won't tell if you won't.
To your health.
Haven't seen you in here before. You staying at the hotel?
translation.ja: 初顔ですね　宿泊を？

translation.en: No.
Well, I hope you don't live far.
It's coming down hard out there.
I have a driver. Driver has an umbrella.
translation.ja: お抱え運転手がいるの

translation.en: He can take us wherever it is you go, when you clock out of there.
translation.ja: あなたの仕事が終わればどこへでも行けるわ

translation.en: Oh, uh...
No, thank you.
I'm really flattered, but, uh...
I'm married.
All I was offering was a ride.
translation.ja: 送っていくと言ったのよ

translation.en: Oh, damn. [chuckles] I'm...
I'm sorry. Please forget I said that.
Sometimes when it gets late, people tend to get a little--
translation.ja: 夜が更けてくるとお客様の中には…

translation.en: Frisky.
Yeah.
Then what?
And then nothing.
I'm married.
Right.
To that emotional girl who just made a spectacle of herself.
translation.ja: そこでドラマを繰り広げていた女性ね

translation.en: That girl's the most important thing in my world.
translation.ja: 世界で一番大切な人です

translation.en: And today was a terrible day for her.
Enjoy your drink.
Now who's been misunderstood?
Let's just call it even.
Let's.
But now you've got me curious.
From where I'm sitting, she's a very lucky woman.
This wife of yours.
Tell me about her.
That's more like it.
You feeling any better?
Hmm... I'm not feeling any worse.
Sorry you married such a train wreck.
Ah, don't worry about it.
I actually met a woman after you staggered up here.
translation.ja: あの後 女性が現れた

translation.en: Can't say I blame you. I hope you two will be very happy together.
translation.ja: 責められない２人の幸せを祈るわ

translation.en: [chuckles] I think she's a little more your type than mine.
translation.ja: 俺より 君のタイプっぽいよ

translation.en: [Sean] Said you'd know who she is.
Anne Montgomery?
I don't-- Is this a joke?
I don't know. Maybe. Who is this lady?
Only one of the most aggressive venture capitalists in town,
translation.ja: この街有数の挑戦的な投資家よ

translation.en: and by all accounts... born of a jackal.
She definitely struck me as the kind of woman who gets what she wants.
translation.ja: 確かにそういう印象だった

translation.en: And what she wants is to meet my wife.
translation.ja: 俺の妻に会いたがってる

translation.en: Wait.
You... told her about me?
Just the basics.
She's hosting some big investor thing and wants to hear more about Emigen.
translation.ja: 投資家を呼ぶからプレゼンしろって

translation.en: Think you can...
squeeze the jackal onto your calendar?
translation.ja: 会う時間ができるかな？

translation.en: I can squeeze a lot more than that.
Morning, Cassidy. You're in early.
translation.ja: キャシディ　早いわね

translation.en: -Late, actually. -You were in all night?
translation.ja: 残業よ 徹夜で何を？

translation.en: What in the world were you doing?
Making sure we didn't overlook any potential Hail Marys.
translation.ja: 最後の可能性がないか確認してた

translation.en: That, and a fistful of Adderall.
translation.ja: 興奮剤を大量に飲んで

translation.en: Unfortunately, you hired a very thorough CFO.
translation.ja: 優秀なＣＦＯ(最高財務責任者)として言うわ

translation.en: I think we're out of options, Lis.
Think again.
What if I told you that we were gonna make a run
translation.ja: まだプレゼン予定があるの

translation.en: at Anne Montgomery?
translation.ja: アン･モンゴメリーの家で

translation.en: Well, I'd ask you if you hit your head.
You don't just demand a meeting with Anne Montgomery. She'd have you executed.
translation.ja: アポ入れを頼むだけで処刑されてしまうわ

translation.en: I didn't have to.
She offered.
She... offered?
Do you know how hard I worked to get us in the door with that woman?
translation.ja: 私がどれほど努力したと？

translation.en: -What did you do? -I promise I'll tell you the story later.
translation.ja: 何したの？ 詳細は後で

translation.en: Now I have to cram my brain full of everything I need to win her over.
translation.ja: 負けられない勝負よ勉強するわ

translation.en: Start and stop right there.
translation.ja: そうね　これを読んで

translation.en: That has been out for less than a week,
translation.ja: １週間前に出版されてもう４回読んだ

translation.en: and I've already read through it, like, four times.
translation.ja: １週間前に出版されてもう４回読んだ「代償を払って」 「代償を払って」

translation.en: She is my spirit animal.
Really?
Everything I've read about her makes her seem kind of... horrible.
translation.ja: ひどい噂しか聞かないけど

translation.en: The world's a horrible place,
but Anne Montgomery wakes up every morning and she eats it for breakfast.
translation.ja: でも彼女はそんなこと気にしない

translation.en: Mrs. McIntire?
It's the EMTs who brought your son to the hospital yesterday.
translation.ja: 息子さんを運んだ救急隊員です

translation.en: Got him a get well present.
I'll just leave it here by the door, okay?
translation.ja: ここに置いておきます

translation.en: Do you smell smoke?
Mrs. McIntire!
Unit 19 shelter fire, 38 East 19th Street!
translation.ja: 19区住宅で火災 イースト19街38番！

translation.en: -[fire alarm blaring] -Everybody out, now!
Mrs. McIntire!
[child] Help!
Help us!
Help!
Help! Help!
[Sean] Come on! We gotta get you out of here!
Mom and kids checked out okay. Social services has them.
translation.ja: 母子は大丈夫だ福祉課が連れてった

translation.en: Cops found the father holed up in the basement.
translation.ja: 父親は地下室に隠れてた

translation.en: Got a list of convictions a mile long.
translation.ja: 犯罪のオンパレードだ

translation.en: [Todd] Assault, possession, trafficking, aggravated child abuse.
translation.ja: 暴行　不法所持　密売幼児虐待…

translation.en: No way this guy should've ever made parole.
translation.ja: ムショにいるべき男だ

translation.en: Hey, whatever's going through your head, it's not worth it.
translation.ja: おい　妙なこと考えるなよ

translation.en: Sean, I'm serious, man. Don't do this. Hey.
translation.ja: おい マジで止めとけ

translation.en: Sean, what the fuck, man?
You the paramedics who rescued that family?
translation.ja: 助けたのは お前達か？

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -[man] You two boys are real heroes.
translation.ja: はい よくやった　全焼を免れた

translation.en: Whole place could've gone up.
translation.ja: よくやった　全焼を免れた

translation.en: Heard one of you applied for the academy.
translation.ja: アカデミー(消防学校)志願か？

translation.en: We both did.
-What are your names? -Todd Archer, Sean Donovan.
translation.ja: 名前は？ トッド･アーチャーショーン･ドノバン

translation.en: Mr. and Mrs. Sean and Lisa Donovan to see Miss Montgomery.
translation.ja: ドノバン夫妻のご到着です

translation.en: Welcome.
I'll let her know you've arrived.
You know that guy?
[Lisa] Not exactly.
[Foster] If you wouldn't mind stepping into the library,
Miss Montgomery will be with you shortly.
Hello, Sean. Don't get up.
translation.ja: ショーン　そのままで

translation.en: I can't spare much time.
You must be Lisa.
Yes. Thank you for the meeting, Miss Montgomery.
I'll get right to it.
No. No need for that.
I've done my homework. You wouldn't be here otherwise.
translation.ja: 調査済みよそれで呼んだの

translation.en: -Thank you. -Oh, don't thank me yet.
translation.ja: 感謝を 気が早いわ

translation.en: Many of my competitors, like that nauseatingly arrogant Gage Scott,
translation.ja: ＧＳＶなど競合他社はプレゼンを気に入りながら

translation.en: whom your husband told me passed on your pitch, make decisions out of fear.
translation.ja: 怖気づいたとショーンに聞いたわ

translation.en: I operate on potential.
Which is something I believe your company has in spades.
translation.ja: あなたの会社は大きな可能性がある

translation.en: It's you I'm not sold on.
translation.ja: あなたには魅力がない

translation.en: How can I convince you otherwise?
Have you read my latest book?
-Studied it. -Oh, is that so?
So tell me...
are you two planning on having children?
-Yeah. -Some day.
Right now, I am one hundred percent focused on Emigen.
translation.ja: 今は仕事に100％集中しているので

translation.en: One hundred percent?
I know you consider the correlation between personal sacrifice and elite success
translation.ja: 私生活の犠牲と仕事の成功の相関関係が

translation.en: to be one of the cornerstones of your business doctrine.
translation.ja: ビジネスの要とお考えですね

translation.en: Not a cornerstone. The foundation.
What I mean to say is I am fully prepared for this opportunity.
translation.ja: この機会をものにする覚悟があります

translation.en: Nothing is more important to me.
Not even your marriage?
What kind of question is that?
It's a question for your wife.
I assume Sean told you how we met?
translation.ja: ショーンとの出会いを？

translation.en: He said you struck up a conversation at the hotel bar.
translation.ja: ホテルのバーで話し始めたと

translation.en: Did he also mention that he thought I was coming on to him?
translation.ja: 私が口説いてると思ったという話も？

translation.en: Smart women have always found Sean attractive.
translation.ja: 彼は賢い女性にもてるんです

translation.en: I consider it a compliment.
So what you're saying is that if I had been trying to seduce your husband...
translation.ja: あの時 旦那さんを口説いていたと言っても

translation.en: you'd still be here?
I'm saying Sean would never cheat on me.
translation.ja: 夫は絶対に浮気しません

translation.en: I trust him.
Trust is the most dangerous thing you can give away, Lisa.
translation.ja: 信頼は与えると最高に危険なのよ

translation.en: But for the sake of argument,
let's take cheating out of the equation.
Say you were fully complicit in our affair.
translation.ja: あなたも共犯だとしたら？

translation.en: Would that be an acceptable condition of a firm offer to finance your company?
translation.ja: それを出資の条件にしてもいいかしら？

translation.en: You're asking if I would be willing to trade my husband for my company?
translation.ja: 会社のために夫を差し出せと？

translation.en: No.
That would not be an acceptable condition...
translation.ja: その条件は飲めません

translation.en: Anne.
Let's get out of here.
Lisa, wait, it's just a game.
translation.ja: 待て これはゲームだ

translation.en: Like Lionel and his bowl of questions.
Only not nearly as original.
This whole idea was ripped right out of a bad '90s movie.
translation.ja: 90年代のイカれた映画のパクリよ

translation.en: She wants to have sex with you, Sean.
-Plain and simple. -Why?
Because Anne is legendary for exploiting people's weaknesses to her advantage.
translation.ja: 彼女は人の弱みにつけこみ自分の要求を通すので有名で

translation.en: She sees our marriage as my weakness.
translation.ja: 私の結婚を弱点と見たの

translation.en: Did I get that right?
All but the movie reference.
I thought that film was quite decent.
By my calculation, it would take roughly 80 million
translation.ja: 私の試算ではコンセプトが実行可能として

translation.en: to optimize your discovery, assuming proof of concept.
translation.ja: 商品化には8000万ドルかかる

translation.en: That's not the kind of investment I'm comfortable making without a guarantee that the woman in charge
translation.ja: 社長が成功のために必要な担保を収めないなら

translation.en: is willing to put whatever is necessary on the line to ensure its success.
translation.ja: 社長が成功のために必要な担保を収めないなら そんな金額の出資はできない

translation.en: In this case...
a night alone with her husband.
My offer expires in 24 hours.
[Anne] What's your name?
-Valerie Simmons. -[Anne] Valerie...
translation.ja: バレリー･シモンズ バレリー…

translation.en: I see you're wearing the same mint Chanel
translation.ja: 私がフォーブス誌の取材で着たのと同じ

translation.en: they put me in for my Forbes spread back in...
translation.ja: 私がフォーブス誌の取材で着たのと同じ ミント色のシャネルね

translation.en: What was it? 2015?
Yes, Miss Montgomery.
Stand up, sweetie.
My lawyers are currently waging a libel suit
translation.ja: あの雑誌の当時の編集長を 我が弁護団が名誉毀損で訴えてる

translation.en: against that dated rag's former editor,
translation.ja: 我が弁護団が名誉毀損で訴えてる

translation.en: and had you done the slightest bit of research,
translation.ja: ちょっとでも調べてれば

translation.en: you might have reconsidered wearing that embarrassing cry for attention,
translation.ja: その場違いな服で注目を浴び―

translation.en: as all you've succeeded in doing today is exposing your own inadequacy.
translation.ja: 自分の愚かさを露呈するようなことはしないはず

translation.en: It's incredible.
Eighteen million views in three days.
Don't do this to yourself.
What kind of person gets off on making others feel stupid
translation.ja: 人を辱め無力で無価値と感じさせて

translation.en: and powerless and disposable?
A shitty one.
It's weird not having Castro here.
I'll meet up with Marcos between shifts and pick him up tomorrow.
translation.ja: 明日 空き時間に引き取りに行くよ

translation.en: No, I'll do it.
Tell me again how everything's gonna be okay.
translation.ja: 全てうまくいくわよね

translation.en: Everything is going to be okay.
[Lisa] Castro! Come here, Castro!
Oh, hi. How much I missed you!
You and Sean live it up like rock stars the other night?
translation.ja: 富豪パーティはどうだった？

translation.en: [Lisa] You know it.
After a few drinks, we got to talking about Lionel's challenge
translation.ja: 数杯飲んで質問ゲームして

translation.en: and decided to order half a dozen couples up to the room.
translation.ja: ６組のカップルと乱交したわ

translation.en: Only half a dozen?
-Prude. -Oh, yeah?
I remember when the most risqué thing in your closet was a pinstriped Oxford.
translation.ja: 昔 兄さんの部屋に正統派シャツがあったけど

translation.en: -[laughs] -Now I'm guessing... pleated, leather chaps.
translation.ja: 今はレザーチャップがあるかもね

translation.en: Don't! Don't!
Oh. The things we do for our first boyfriends.
First and last, hopefully.
I want with Lionel what you have with Sean.
translation.ja: お前達みたいになりたい

translation.en: What's that, exactly?
Total trust.
And you two are invincible no matter what the universe throws at you.
translation.ja: どんな運命でも２人なら負けないだろ

translation.en: Yeah, well, the universe has been having a field day with us recently.
translation.ja: 運命は最近ハメを外しすぎる

translation.en: And that brings me to my not-so-elegant segue.
translation.ja: さらに追い打ちをかけるようだが…

translation.en: [sighs] Papa would kill me if he knew I was telling you this, but...
translation.ja: 口止めされていたんだが…

translation.en: La Cuchara's been going through a rough patch.
translation.ja: 親父の店の景気が悪くて お前がいつ返済できるか聞いてきた

translation.en: He asked if I knew when you might be able to pay the loan back.
translation.ja: お前がいつ返済できるか聞いてきた

translation.en: It's gonna be a while.
How bad is it?
Turns out the money they gave you didn't come from savings.
translation.ja: 貸した金は 貯金じゃなく

translation.en: They got a second mortgage on the restaurant.
translation.ja: 店を担保に借りたそうだ

translation.en: If they default...
they could lose everything.
All my cases have been pro bono this year, so I'm pretty tapped.
translation.ja: 俺は今 無料弁護ばかりで金がない

translation.en: I'd ask Lionel, but he's been--
No, it's my responsibility, Marcos.
translation.ja: いえ　私の責任だから

translation.en: I will take care of it.
[Sean's voice] I'll never forget the day I met my wife.
translation.ja: 妻に会った日は一生忘れない

translation.en: For those of you who don't know the story, there's this spot in Corona Heights Park
translation.ja: コロナ･ハイツ公園には 兄とよく野球の練習をした場所がある

translation.en: where my brother and I used to play catch.
translation.ja: 兄とよく野球の練習をした場所がある

translation.en: After he died, it kind of became my go-to place for heavy thinking.
translation.ja: 兄が他界した後 悩みがある度そこへ行った

translation.en: Which I was doing a lot of last year,
translation.ja: 昨年 ジャイアンツをクビになった時も

translation.en: especially on the day the Giants told me they weren't picking up my contract.
translation.ja: 昨年 ジャイアンツをクビになった時も あそこに行った

translation.en: Giants suck!
No, no. I had a terrible season, Archer, you know it, I know it,
translation.ja: 昨シーズンの俺は最低だった 皆知っての通りさ

translation.en: -the whole city knew it. -Story's got a happy ending, though.
translation.ja: 皆知っての通りさ 話に続きがある

translation.en: I'm getting to that, if you'll let me.
So when I get to the park that day...
translation.ja: あの日もそこへ行くと

translation.en: I find this...
incredibly beautiful...
really inconvenient grad student sitting on my bench,
translation.ja: あろうことか俺のベンチに陣取り

translation.en: working on her biology thesis.
And while there's this massive deadline hanging over her head,
translation.ja: 締切のことで頭が一杯だったが―

translation.en: she took pity on a total stranger...
and let me share the bench with her.
It wasn't until after the sun went down...
that I realized what...
what started out as one of the toughest days of my life...
translation.ja: 人生最良の日となったことに

translation.en: had turned into one of the best.
If you hadn't let me sit down with you that day, I... I have
translation.ja: あの出会いがなければ

translation.en: no idea what my future might have turned into.
translation.ja: 俺の人生はどうなっていたか

translation.en: [Lisa] Excuse me, sir.
Is this seat taken?
Want me to go first?
Nah, I got the cleat.
Todd and I found out we made it into the fire academy today.
translation.ja: アカデミー(消防学校)への入学が決まったんだ

translation.en: Oh, my God. That's--
Intense timing.
I know.
I'm so proud of you.
Thanks, but both our backs are seriously against the wall right now.
translation.ja: でも今はタイミングが悪すぎる

translation.en: We can't afford a downshift in income.
Even a temporary one, so I...
I came here to think about our options.
translation.ja: それで選択肢を検討した

translation.en: Everything that's gotten us to this point.
And?
And the first thing that popped into my head
translation.ja: 最初に思い浮かんだのは

translation.en: was how crazy it is we ever met in the first place.
translation.ja: 俺達が出会えたのは奇跡だってこと

translation.en: What if you decided to study at the library that day instead of here?
translation.ja: あの日君は図書館に行かず

translation.en: Or if Todd hadn't gotten called into work. I...
translation.ja: トッドが仕事に呼ばれて…

translation.en: might have been drowning myself at some bar with him instead of meeting my future wife.
translation.ja: 俺はバーに行かなかったから出会えた

translation.en: It's a real rabbit hole thinking about the things that had to go exactly right,
translation.ja: あの日あの瞬間にここで出会うために

translation.en: stuff that had to go so fucking terrible to lead us both to this bench
translation.ja: あの最低なことが起き― 全ての偶然が重なる必要があった

translation.en: at that moment, on that day.
translation.ja: 全ての偶然が重なる必要があった

translation.en: So I've been sitting here going over what you said...
translation.ja: ここで君が言ったことを…

translation.en: about...
feeling disposable and--
Powerless.
Yeah.
So now I guess I'm wondering how you'd feel if we made a decision to take some power back.
translation.ja: 力を取り戻すための決断を下すのはどうかな？

translation.en: I've been wondering the same thing.
We've both come through... [sighs]
...a hell of a lot in our lives.
But at least we know...
we can trust each other to handle anything.
translation.ja: 何があっても信頼し合える

translation.en: And...
I don't think there's any way someone as patently pathetic as Anne Montgomery
translation.ja: あんな憐れな女が私達の間に割り込むなんて

translation.en: has what it takes to get in between that, not in one night.
translation.ja: あんな憐れな女が私達の間に割り込むなんて 一晩でできるわけがない

translation.en: Not in one lifetime.
Well...
we still have a few hours to tell this bitch
translation.ja: あのクソ女を拒絶するまで

translation.en: to go to hell.
But you and me...
we're a lot stronger than she thinks we are.
So are we saying we're good to do this?
I am if you are.
Then let's do it.
Hello, Lisa.
[Lisa] We accept your offer.
I'll send a car.
Why don't you pour yourself a whiskey.
I don't think so.
There's no need to be nervous.
No one said we were.
Sean, come here for a sec.
She wrote a clause into the contract excluding you from sharing any details
translation.ja: これから起きることについて 他言禁ずと条件に盛り込まれてる

translation.en: about what happens after I leave here tonight.
translation.ja: 他言禁ずと条件に盛り込まれてる

translation.en: [whispers] If you say anything to me
translation.ja: あなたが 私や誰かに言えば

translation.en: or anyone else, we lose the company.
translation.ja: あなたが 私や誰かに言えば 会社を失う

translation.en: Why would either of us ever want to talk about this again?
translation.ja: 今夜のことを蒸し返す必要はない

translation.en: The quicker we put tonight behind us, the better.
We just have to trust each other.
[scoffs] It's not you I don't trust.
I assume you saw the space for your company's routing numbers.
translation.ja: 資金が底をつきそうなんでしょ？

translation.en: That's why we're here, isn't it?
Well, it's certainly why you're here.
You'll receive a good faith wire transfer
totaling a quarter of my investment, tomorrow morning.
translation.ja: 明日の朝 振り込むわ

translation.en: Twenty million dollars.
Well...
it appears there's only one thing left to do.
translation.ja: 後やるべきことは１つだけ

translation.en: Well, two.
Foster, we'll need a witness.
translation.ja: フォスター 証人になって

translation.en: Sean, may I have your phone, please?
translation.ja: ショーン 電話を渡して

translation.en: Why do you need his phone?
If you're having second thoughts, now is the time to share them.
translation.ja: 気が変わったのなら今 言って 深夜に半狂乱のメッセージは困るの

translation.en: Not some desperate text in the middle of the night.
translation.ja: 深夜に半狂乱のメッセージは困るの

translation.en: Thank you.
I'll let you say goodbye.
I love you.
[whispers] I love you.
Oh, keep the pen. It's one of many.
Come sit with me by the fire.
If it's okay, can we not talk anymore and just...
translation.ja: おしゃべりなしでことを…

translation.en: do what you brought me here to do?
Well, aren't you just so sweet and innocent?
translation.ja: 本当に無知な坊やなのね

translation.en: I haven't even begun to tell you what it is you're doing here.
translation.ja: 何をするかまだ伝えてないわ

translation.en: In science, one of the first things you learn
translation.ja: 科学の授業で最初に学ぶのは

translation.en: is that you can only trust the things that you can prove.
translation.ja: 信じられるのは証明できるものだけということ

translation.en: But if any of you guys ask me to offer...
translation.ja: ショーンがどれほど大切か

translation.en: physical proof of...
just how much Sean means to me...
there's no empirical way that I could.
translation.ja: 化学式では証明できない

translation.en: [Lisa] And this is what's called...
the scientific paradox.
-Oh, my God. I am so bad at this. -[crowd laughs]
translation.ja: 最悪だわ　スピーチは苦手

translation.en: Oh, my God.
What I'm...
trying to say is...
translation.ja: 伝えたかったのは… 〝両当事者は連絡を取らない…〞

translation.en: -Falling in love with Sean has taught me-- -[sighs]
translation.ja: ショーンと恋に落ちて

translation.en: ...it's just as important to trust the things that you can feel...
translation.ja: 証明可能なこと同様感情を信じることも

translation.en: as the things you can prove.
Fuck!
[guard] Hey! Hey!
Hello? Can anybody hear me?
-[elevator bell dings] -Fuck.
Sean!
-Sean! -[thunderclap]
Sean! Call it off!
They're gone.
Where did you take them?
When I returned, the residence was empty.
translation.ja: 戻ってきた時にはいなかった

translation.en: Mrs. Montgomery? Are you okay?
translation.ja: 奥様？　大丈夫ですか？

translation.en: Everything's all right, Gabriel. The young lady's under contract.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だこの女性は取引先だ

translation.en: Keycard, please.
What does she get out of it?
Treating people like toys?
What motivates Miss Montgomery is far more nuanced than I could say.
translation.ja: 奥様の動機は複雑で言葉にできません

translation.en: But I have never seen her waste a minute of time on anything...
translation.ja: ですが何に対しても誰に対しても…

translation.en: or anyone... so insignificant as a toy.
translation.ja: 無駄な時間を過ごしません

translation.en: Hello, Cassidy?
[Cassidy] Where have you been? Did you get any of my messages?
translation.ja: 今どこ？メッセージ見た？

translation.en: [sighs] No, I...
What's happened?
Anne Montgomery just saved our ass to the tune of $20 million.
translation.ja: モンゴメリーから2000万ドルの送金があり

translation.en: That's what happened.
Whatever the hell you did to win her over, it could not have paid off any huger.
translation.ja: 何をしたか知らないけど報われたわよ

translation.en: I'll call you back.
Sean.
Are you okay?
Hey, buddy.
Your hand... What did she...?
We're not allowed to talk about it.
You can... if you want to.
translation.ja: 話せるわ　あなた次第よ

translation.en: [Lisa] The contract isn't triggered until I start spending her money.
Then start spending it.
Nothing I say now will undo what we did. Might as well get what you wanted.
translation.ja: 過去を消せないならせめて君の望みを

translation.en: What I wanted?
Sean, I went back for you. I tried to stop it.
translation.ja: あそこに戻って止めようとした

translation.en: Say something.
I need to take a shower.
Your breakfast meeting has arrived.
I'll tell 'em you're indisposed.
You think I'm a terrible person, don't you?
translation.ja: ひどい人と思ってるのね

translation.en: I think when you've suffered terrible things...
you become capable of terrible things.
translation.ja: 何でもできるようになる

translation.en: Have the staff clear my calendar. I won't be taking any meetings this morning.
translation.ja: 今朝の会議は全て欠席すると伝えて

translation.en: ♪ Give me more ♪
♪ Crushed and filled with all I found ♪ ♪ Underneath and inside ♪
translation.ja: “乱打されドノバン途中交代”

translation.en: ♪ Just to come around ♪ ♪ More, give me more, give me more ♪
translation.ja: “バーの客　何者かに襲われ ひん死”
